sentence: The Republican contest, meanwhile, is a battle between Jason Killmeyer, a national security analyst who often appears in conservative media; former Ross Township Commissioner Jeremy Shaffer; and business owner Kathleen Coder.
title: Morning Digest: This swing seat in Pittsburgh suburbs went blue in 2018, but will it stay that way?

sentence: Former Ross County Commissioner Jeremy Shaffer, 2018 lieutenant governor candidate Kathleen Coder and former Project Veritas COO Jason Killmeyer are running for the GOP nomination.
author: Nathan L. Gonzales
title: Race ratings show Republicans positioned for pickups in Pennsylvania
